alfredsnippet.snippet:
https://phys.org/news/2009-01-scientists-comet-mammoths-saber-toothed-tigers.html

"It's extraordinary that tens of millions of animals disappeared synchronously at exactly the time when the diamonds and carbon layer are laid down across the continent ...

In 2007, West and a team of scientists published an analysis of black mats from several regions that found heavy metals, soot and charcoal suggestive of meteorite impacts and subsequent fires. The new report says the discovery of nanodiamonds in the same material is more evidence of a cosmic strike ..."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Extinction of the Mammoths - Part 1
